name: User Dashboard Notifications
author: Francisco Mauri

sections.description: Add and mange notifications from Administrator account to notify other registered users in the site, registered users will dismiss the notification and it will be reflected in admin notification list.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/user-dashboard-notifications directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • first version of the plugin, beta version.

short_description: User dashboard notifications plugin lets administrators create notifications to be displayed in admin panel for users or group of users(roles).
description: Add and mange notifications from Administrator account to notify other registered users in the site, registered users will dismiss the notification and it will be reflected in admin notification list.
